name: Lost Gladiator
description:
Herkese merhaba, oyunu yüklerken birkaç problemle karşılaştık, bazı buglar hala var ama oynamak isterseniz link burda:

https://carpetgames.itch.io/lost-gladiator-bug-free-verson 

A top-down shooter arena in which you lose as you win. Defeat waves of enemies, lose a weapon as you win but keep continue to dominate the arena.

* [W,A,S,D] to move

* [SPACE] to dash

* [LEFT CLICK] to shoot and use the [ SCROLL WHEEL] to change weapons.

CARPET GAMES

  • Utku Tan Baylan - e231167#6042, Sound Design
  • Metehan Koç - mthnkc#4853, Programmer
  • Alkım Onen - alkimonen#7318, Programmer
  • Osman K. Yayla - osmanKY#2555, Pixel Art and Design
  • Utku Çitli- caraculi#1462, Video Editor
